name: Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis
description:
This script will assist you to install this game on Linux OS:
"Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis" provided by GOG using ScummVM runner.
During install please let all options by default.
Thanks to the people who contributed to play this game in the best conditions on Linux platform.
notes:
- This script is only compatible with the game installation file for Windows in exe format provided by GOG.
- Multilanguage: you could choose your preferred subtitles language during install between english, french, italian, spanish and german. The voices will still stay in english.
Credits: 
(FR) https://www.planete-aventure.net/forums/viewtopic.php?f=50&t=6551
(IT) http://www.oldgamesitalia.net/traduzioni/indiana-jones-and-fate-atlantis-conversione-vers-talkie
(ES) http://traducciones.clandlan.net/index.php?page=academia%2Fsearch&search=indiana
(DE) https://www.la-patches.de/patches.php
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

script.custom-name: Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis - GOG

files.gog: N/A:Please select the game Windows setup exe file downloaded from GOG

input_menu.description: Please choose your preferred subtitles language:

options.keep: I prefer to keep the default install language

execute.command: cd $GAMEDIR; cp other/ATLANTIS.ICO other/HELPME.DOC . ; rm -f -r app commonappdata other __redist scummvm __support tmp goggame-1207666293.* ; if [ "$INPUT_LANG" == "keep" ]; then  exit ; fi ; echo "lang = $INPUT_LANG"; patch < $CACHE/$INPUT_LANG/ATLANTIS.000.patch ATLANTIS.000; patch < $CACHE/$INPUT_LANG/ATLANTIS.001.patch ATLANTIS.001;

content:
custom-name: Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis - GOG
files:
- multi5: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Indiana%20Jones%20and%20the%20Fate%20of%20Atlantis/indi4_multi5.zip
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
- gog: N/A:Please select the game Windows setup exe file downloaded from GOG
game:
  args: --subtitles
  game_id: atlantis
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/innoextract
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: --extract $gog --output-dir "$CACHE/indy"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/
    src: $CACHE/indy
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: multi5
- input_menu:
    description: 'Please choose your preferred subtitles language:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - keep: I prefer to keep the default install language
    - fr: French
    - sp: Spanish
    - ge: German
    - it: Italian
    preselect: keep
- execute:
    command: cd $GAMEDIR; cp other/ATLANTIS.ICO other/HELPME.DOC . ; rm -f -r app
      commonappdata other __redist scummvm __support tmp goggame-1207666293.* ; if
      [ "$INPUT_LANG" == "keep" ]; then  exit ; fi ; echo "lang = $INPUT_LANG"; patch
      < $CACHE/$INPUT_LANG/ATLANTIS.000.patch ATLANTIS.000; patch < $CACHE/$INPUT_LANG/ATLANTIS.001.patch
      ATLANTIS.001;
scummvm:
  aspect: true
  fullscreen: true
